meanings.definition: The state or quality of being alike.
meanings.sent1: The alikenesses between the twins were striking.
meanings.sent2: There was an undeniable alikenesses between the two paintings.
meanings.sent3: The alikenesses in their taste in music made them instant friends.
meanings.sent4: The alikenesses in their personalities were like two peas in a pod.
meanings.sent5: The alikenesses in their mannerisms were uncanny.
